I see no steps or information about how to reproduce this?

What driver are you on?  Please reopen this defect when you provide more
information.

This is happening when any ejb jar or ear are imported headless
using import data model providers.  It happens on wtp 6/17.

I have later found out this happens only when the jst plugins are imported 
into a self host workspace. So the severity is set to normal.
Please provide a test case to reproduce this; I have never seen this problem.
